snippet.title: Swirl W@tch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Swirl W@tch on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2081970/Swirl_Wtch/

More from Sleeper Games:
https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/sleepergames

Swirl W@tch is a tense stealth-action roguelite that takes place on an over-exploited gas giant. Infiltrate industrial installations, evade or eliminate guard ships, commit corporate sabotage and grow the movement to unlock new gear. Can your actions free this otherworldly world?

Press Kit: https://abyssinian-share-16b.notion.site/Swirl-W-tch-dde3283fefe24d869416ef7c4d681e40

Contact 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sleeper_Games
Mail: stefan [at] sleepergames.com
